Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off).

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (DeviceTemperatureExceeded = True).

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.ToolTip: Aborts the Acquisition immediately.
Command.Description: Aborts the Acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger. If no Acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionFrameRateEnable = False).

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: ((AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AcquisitionMode != Multi Frame)).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (ExposureMode = TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the selected trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger source is active.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger source is active. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode = Timed).

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All trigger sources are active.
EnumEntry.Description: All trigger sources are active. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Action1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode = Timed).

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter1End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter2End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted (or latched) for a new frame. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (TriggerMode = On) AND (TriggerSource = Input Line) AND (ExposureAuto = Off).

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (ExposureMode = TriggerWidth) OR ((ExposureAuto != Off) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off)).

Float.Name: ExposureTimeGapMin
Float.ToolTip: Returns the minimum value of the exposure time gap.
Float.Description: Returns the minimum value of the exposure time gap. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeGapMax
Float.ToolTip: Returns the maximum value of the exposure time gap.
Float.Description: Returns the maximum value of the exposure time gap. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: ShortExposureTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if short exposure time should be supported.
Boolean.Description: Controls if short exposure time should be supported. Note that if this feature is enabled, the sequencer cannot be used. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (ExposureTime is in the Short ExposureTime range).

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (ExposureMode = Timed) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (ExposureMode = Timed) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime, etc... AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: ReadoutMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Sequential
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sequential Readout.
EnumEntry.Description: Sequential Readout. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Overlapped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Overlapped Readout.
EnumEntry.Description: Overlapped Readout. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreenRed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green red channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreenBlue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green blue channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the blue channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (((GainSelector = All) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off)) AND (GainAuto != Off)) OR ((GainSelector != All) AND ((BalanceWhiteAuto != Off) OR (ColorTransformationAuto != Off))).

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is User controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is User controlled using Gain. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: ((SequencerMode = Off) AND (GainSelector = All)) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: ((SequencerMode = Off) AND (GainSelector = All)) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT). AVAILABLE: (LUTContent != UserdefinedLUT). LOCKED: (LUTEnable = False).

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is off.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is off. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Boolean.Name: HighConversionGainEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the high conversion gain mode inside the sensor.
Boolean.Description: Enables the high conversion gain mode inside the sensor. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

Float.Name: HighConversionGain
Float.ToolTip: Returns the high conversion gain of the sensor.
Float.Description: Returns the high conversion gain of the sensor. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: AutoFeatureCycleTime
Float.ToolTip: Cycle Time of auto feature control loop in milliseconds for once and continuous mode.
Float.Description: Cycle Time of auto feature control loop in milliseconds for once and continuous mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFeatureRegionSelector

LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Description: The PWM Mode is off. The ourput line acts as a normal output. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OnePulse
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected output line generate one pulse with every transition from 0 to 1.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected output line generate one pulse with every transition from 0 to 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FixedFrequency
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected output line generate a fixed frequency of pulses starting with every transition from 0 to 1 and stopping with every transition from 1 to 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected output line generate a fixed frequency of pulses starting with every transition from 0 to 1 and stopping with every transition from 1 to 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: LinePWMMaxDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds.
Integer.Description: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: (LinePWMConfigurationMode = False).

Integer.Name: LinePWMOffTime
Integer.ToolTip: Offers the off time included in the PWM Period in microseconds.
Integer.Description: Offers the off time included in the PWM Period in microseconds. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: LinePWMPeriodTime
Integer.ToolTip: Offers the off time in the PWM Period in microseconds.
Integer.Description: Offers the period time calculated of the given Duration and Duty Cycle in microseconds. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: LinePWMDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds.
Integer.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: LinePWMDutyCycle
Integer.ToolTip: Offers the duty cycle in percent.
Integer.Description: Offers the duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: LinePWMMaxDutyCycle
Integer.ToolTip: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent.
Integer.Description: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: (LineMode[LineSelector] = Output). LOCKED: (LinePWMConfigurationMode = False).

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: PrimaryApplicationSwitch
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Then event will be generated when a primary application switchover has been granted.
EnumEntry.Description: Then event will be generated when a primary application switchover has been granted. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVisionError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just detected an error.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just detected an error. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVisionHeartbeatTimeOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device runs in heartbeat timeout.
EnumEntry.Description: The device runs in heartbeat timeout. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 1.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line4RisingEdge

EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 4. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line4FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 4.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 4. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 5.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 5. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 5.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 5. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line6RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 6.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 6. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line6FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 6.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 6. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line7RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 7.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Rising Edge is detected on the Line 7. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line7FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 7.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when a Falling Edge is detected on the Line 7. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just started the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device just started the exposure of one Frame (or Line). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame (or Line). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just started the capture of one Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just started the capture of one Frame. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just completed the capture of one Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just completed the capture of one Frame. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerReady
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when the camera is able to process an incoming trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when the camera is able to process an incoming trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerOverlapped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger Overlapped.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger Overlapped. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerSkipped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when camera reject an incoming trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when camera reject an incoming trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: EventLost
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when an event was lost in the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when an event was lost in the camera. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TransferBufferFull
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when no internal camera buffer is available.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when no internal camera buffer is available. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TransferBufferReady
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when an internal camera buffer is available again.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when an internal camera buffer is available again. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTransferSkipped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when the internal camera buffer is overflowed and an image has been lost.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when the internal camera buffer is overflowed and an image has been lost. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceTemperatureStatusChanged
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when the status of the internal device temperature has been changed.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when the status of the internal device temperature has been changed. AVAILABLE: If temperature monitoring is implemented.

EnumEntry.Name: PtpStatusChanged
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when the status of the internal PTP state machine has been changed.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when the status of the internal PTP state machine has been changed. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PtpServoStatusChanged
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The event will be generated when the status of the internal PTP servo has been changed.
EnumEntry.Description: The event will be generated when the status of the internal PTP servo has been changed. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activates or deactivates the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
Enumeration.Description: Activates or deactivates the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is disabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification is disabled. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification is enabled. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: HDREnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode of the camera.
Boolean.Description: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode of the camera. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (BinningVertical[BinningSelector = Sensor] = True) OR (HDRExposureTimeRatio * ExposureTime > ExposureTime.Max) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: HDRExposureTimeRatio
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the exposure time ratio for HDR mode.
Integer.Description: Sets the exposure time ratio for HDR mode. Valid values are only power-of-two numbers. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: HDRExposureTimeBrightArea
Float.ToolTip: Returns the exposure time for bright areas of image.
Float.Description: Returns the exposure time for bright areas of image. This value represents the short exposure time and is equal to the specified value of the standard feature ExposureTime. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: HDRExposureTimeDarkArea
Float.ToolTip: Returns the exposure time for dark areas of image.
Float.Description: Returns the exposure time for dark areas of image. This value represents the long exposure time, which is derived from short exposure time multiplied by HDRExposureTimeRatio. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: HDRGainRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the gain ratio for HDR mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the gain ratio for HDR mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (BinningVertical[BinningSelector = Sensor] = True) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 0dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 0dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain2p5dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 2.5dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 2.5dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain3p5dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 3.5dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 3.5dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain6dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 6.0dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 6.0dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain9p5dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 9.5dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 9.5dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain12dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 12.0dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 12.0dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain18dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 18dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 18dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain24dB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 24dB.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets HDR gain ratio to dynamic range of 24dB. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: HDRGainRatio
Float.ToolTip: Returns the gain ratio for HDR mode.
Float.Description: Returns the gain ratio for HDR mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: HDRGainBrightArea
Float.ToolTip: Returns the sensor gain for bright areas of image.
Float.Description: Returns the sensor gain for bright areas of image. This value represents the lower gain used as offset for the HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: HDRGainDarkArea
Float.ToolTip: Returns the sensor gain for dark areas of image.
Float.Description: Returns the sensor gain for dark areas of image. This value represents the higher gain, which is derived from lower gain and HDRGainRatio. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: HDRProcessingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the calculation of an interleaved HDR image of the sensor to an HDR image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the calculation of an interleaved HDR image of the sensor to an HDR image. If this feature is disabled while HDR is enabled the interleaved HDR image of the sensor will be output. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: HDRProcessingSmoothingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables smoothing of normalized neighbor pixels in HDR mode.
Boolean.Description: Enables smoothing of normalized neighbor pixels in HDR mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRProcessingThresholdMin
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the lower threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing.
Integer.Description: Specifies the lower threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRProcessingThresholdMax
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the upper threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing.
Integer.Description: Specifies the upper threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: HDRSplitviewEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the split view of interleaved HDR image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the split view of interleaved HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: If exposure time-based interleaved HDR AND ((SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1)).

Boolean.Name: HDRTonemappingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the tone-mapping of calculated HDR image. If this feature is deactivated HDR pixels are only cropped to width of specified Pixelformat and HDR information will be lost. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (HDREnable = False).

Integer.Name: HDRTonemappingMax
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the statistical maximal pixel value for local tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image.
Integer.Description: Specifies the statistical maximal pixel value for local tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRTonemappingMean
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the statistical mean value for local tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image.
Integer.Description: Specifies the statistical mean value for local tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: HDRTonemappingCurvePresetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the predefined transfer curve for global tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the predefined transfer curve for global tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Preset1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a steep logarithmic transfer curve will be used.
EnumEntry.Description: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a steep logarithmic transfer curve will be used. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Preset2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a middle steep logarithmic transfer curve will be used.
EnumEntry.Description: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a middle steep logarithmic transfer curve will be used. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Preset3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a slight logarithmic transfer curve will be used.
EnumEntry.Description: The HDR tone-mapping preset for a slight logarithmic transfer curve will be used. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveResetToPreset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the tone-mapping curve to the selected HDRTonemappingCurvePreset.
Command.Description: Resets the tone-mapping curve to the selected HDRTonemappingCurvePreset. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.
Command.DisplayName: HDR Tonemapping Curve Reset To Preset

Integer.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveGridpointIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the index of grid point for the user-defined tone-mapping curve.
Integer.Description: Sets the index of grid point for the user-defined tone-mapping curve. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveGridpoint
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
Integer.Description: Sets the grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (HDRTonemappingCurveGridpointIndex = 0).

Float.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveGradient
Float.ToolTip: Sets the gradient at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
Float.Description: Sets the gradient at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveOffset
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the offset at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
Integer.Description: Sets the offset at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 3. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 4.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 4. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 5.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 5. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region6
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 6.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 6. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region7
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 7.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 7. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: RegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off). LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR (SequencerMode = On) OR (RegionSelector = Region0) OR (ShadingEnable = On) OR ((RegionMode = On) AND (Binning > 1)) OR (ImageCompressionMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the usage of the Region. AVAILABLE: (RegionSelector != Region0).

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the usage of the Region. AVAILABLE: If region values are valid. MROI only if NOT(Color AND PixelFormat is a calculated format) AND (HDREnable = False).

String.Name: RegionVersion
String.ToolTip: Returns the Version of Multi ROI implementation.
String.Description: Returns the Version of Multi ROI implementation. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: RegionAcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the acquisition mode of the regions.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the acquisition mode of the regions. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Regions acquisition is in sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Regions acquisition is in sensor. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Memory
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Regions acquisition is in memory.
EnumEntry.Description: Regions acquisition is in memory. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: RegionTransferMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the transfer mode of the regions.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the transfer mode of the regions. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: SeparateImages
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Each region is transfered as a separate image.
EnumEntry.Description: Each region is transfered as a separate image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: StackedImage
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All regions are transfered as one stacked image.
EnumEntry.Description: All regions are transfered as one stacked image. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: RegionConfigurationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the configuration mode of the regions.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the configuration mode of the regions. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Overlapping
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Region can be overlapped.
EnumEntry.Description: Region can be overlapped. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: NonOverlapping
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Regions are not allowed to be overlapped.
EnumEntry.Description: Regions are not allowed to be overlapped. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR ((AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR ((MulrtiROI enabled) AND RegionMode = On).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (RegionMode = On) OR (Color AND Color binning not supported AND PixelFormat is a calculated format) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity. AVAILABLE: If Sum is available for [BinningSelector].

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio. AVAILABLE: If Average is available for [BinningSelector].

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (RegionMode = On) OR (Color AND Color binning not supported AND PixelFormat is a calculated format) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: BinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity. AVAILABLE: If Sum is available for [BinningSelector].

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio. AVAILABLE: If Average is available for [BinningSelector].

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The ROI is applied before the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (PixelFormat is a Bayer format) OR (ReverseX not allowed together with ReverseY AND ReverseY = True).

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The ROI is applied before the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (PixelFormat is a Bayer format) OR (ReverseY not allowed together with ReverseX AND ReverseX = True).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 8 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 8 bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled))).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 10 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 10 bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 10 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 10 bit packed. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 12 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 12 bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 12 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 12 bit packed. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green 8 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green 8 bit. AVAILABLE: ((ReverseX = False) AND (ReverseY = False)) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green 10 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green 10 bit. AVAILABLE: ((ReverseX = False) AND (ReverseY = False)) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green 10 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green 10 bit packed. AVAILABLE: ((ReverseX = False) AND (ReverseY = False)) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green 12 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green 12 bit. AVAILABLE: ((ReverseX = False) AND (ReverseY = False)) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green 12 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green 12 bit packed. AVAILABLE: ((ReverseX = False) AND (ReverseY = False)) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: RGB8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Red, Green, Blue 8 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Red, Green, Blue 8 bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: BGR8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Blue, Green, Red, 8 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Blue, Green, Red, 8 bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND (MROI enabled) AND (ImageCompressionMode = Off)).

EnumEntry.Name: YCbCr422_8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: YCbCr 4:2:2 8-bit.
EnumEntry.Description: YCbCr 4:2:2 8-bit. AVAILABLE: (NOT(Color AND MROI enabled)).

String.Name: ImageCompressionVersion
String.ToolTip: Describe the Version of Image Compression implementation.
String.Description: Describe the Version of Image Compression implementation. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
Enumeration.Description: Enables a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer. Optionally, chunk data can be appended to the compressed image (See the Chunk Data Control chapter). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Default value.
EnumEntry.Description: Default value. Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: JPEG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: JPEG compression is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: JPEG compression is selected. AVAILABLE: ((PixelFormat = Mono8) OR (PixelFormat = YCbCr422_8)) AND (NOT MultiROI) AND ((SequencerMode = Off) OR ((SequencerMode = On) AND ((SequencerFeatureEnable[Height] = Off) AND (SequencerFeatureEnable[Width] = Off)))).

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionRateOption
Enumeration.ToolTip: Two rate controlling options are offered: fixed bit rate or fixed quality.
Enumeration.Description: Two rate controlling options are offered: fixed bit rate or fixed quality. The exact implementation to achieve one or the other is vendor-specific. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: FixQuality
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output stream has a constant image quality.
EnumEntry.Description: Output stream has a constant image quality. Can be used when image processing algorithms are sensitive to image degradation caused by excessive data compression. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the quality of the produced compressed stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the quality of the produced compressed stream. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionJPEGFormatOption
Enumeration.ToolTip: When JPEG is selected as the compression format, a device might optionally offer better control over JPEG-specific options through this feature.
Enumeration.Description: When JPEG is selected as the compression format, a device might optionally offer better control over JPEG-specific options through this feature. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: BaselineStandard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates this is a baseline sequential (single-scan) DCT-based JPEG.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates this is a baseline sequential (single-scan) DCT-based JPEG. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: ImageProcessor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the image processor.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the image processor. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorProcessor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the sensor processor.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor processor. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with moving horizontal lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with moving horizontal lines. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampHorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Horizontal Ramp Horizontal Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampHorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Vertical Ramp Horizontal Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRampHorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Diagonal Ramp Horizontal Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: VerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with moving vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with moving vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Horizontal Ramp Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Vertical Ramp Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRampVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Diagonal Ramp Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalAndVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with moving horizontal and vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with moving horizontal and vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampHorizontalAndVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Horizontal Ramp Horizontal And Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampHorizontalAndVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Vertical Ramp Horizontal And Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRampHorizontalAndVerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest with moving horizontal and vertical lines. AVAILABLE: Always.
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Grey Diagonal Ramp Horizontal And Vertical Line Moving

EnumEntry.Name: PseudonoiseAndStaticRegions
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with pseudo noise and static regions.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with pseudo noise and static regions. AVAILABLE: (TestPatternGeneratorSelector = ImageProcessor).

EnumEntry.Name: DiagonalLaserLine
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with lines that emulate diagonal laser lines.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with lines that emulate diagonal laser lines. AVAILABLE: (TestPatternGeneratorSelector = ImageProcessor).

Enumeration.Name: SensorShutterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the shutter mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the shutter mode of the device. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Global
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time at the same time.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time at the same time. AVAILABLE: Always.

StringReg.Name: SensorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Product name of the imaging Sensor.
StringReg.Description: Product name of the imaging Sensor. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: SensorPixelWidth
Float.ToolTip: Physical size (pitch) in the x direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the x direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: SensorPixelHeight
Float.ToolTip: Physical size (pitch) in the y direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit.
Float.Description: Physical size (pitch) in the y direction of a photo sensitive pixel unit. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: SensorADDigitization
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the sensors AD digitization in bits per pixels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the sensors AD digitization in bits per pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sensors AD digitization is 8 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: The sensors AD digitization is 8 bits per pixel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sensors AD digitization is 10 bit per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: The sensors AD digitization is 10 bit per pixel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The sensors AD digitization is 12 bit per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: The sensors AD digitization is 12 bit per pixel. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: ShadingEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the Shading Correction.
Boolean.Description: Enables the Shading Correction. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (MROI enabled).

Command.Name: ShadingCalibrationStart
Command.ToolTip: Start.
Command.Description: Starts the Shading Calibration. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

Enumeration.Name: SharpeningMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Sharpening Mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Sharpening Mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sharpening is disabled.
EnumEntry.Description: Sharpening is disabled. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GlobalSharpening
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sharpening is enabled in global sharpening mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Sharpening is enabled in global sharpening mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AdaptiveSharpening
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sharpening is enabled in adaptive sharpening mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Sharpening is enabled in adaptive sharpening mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ActiveNoiseReduction
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sharpening is enabled in active noise reduction mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Sharpening is enabled in active noise reduction mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: SharpeningSensitivityThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Holds the value of the Sharpening Sensitivity Threshold.
Integer.Description: Holds the value of the Sharpening Sensitivity Threshold. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: SharpeningFactor
Integer.ToolTip: Contains the factor for Sharpening.
Integer.Description: Contains the factor for Sharpening. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which LUT to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Luminance
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Luminance LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Luminance LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Red LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Red LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Green LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Green LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Blue LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Blue LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: LUTContent
Enumeration.ToolTip: Describes the content of the selected LUT.
Enumeration.Description: Describes the content of the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: (LUTSelector = Luminance) AND (Gamma OR LUTValue was changed before). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: UserdefinedLUT
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The content of the selected LUT is user defined.
EnumEntry.Description: The content of the selected LUT is user defined. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gamma
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The content of the selected LUT is defined by the value of the feature Gamma.
EnumEntry.Description: The content of the selected LUT is defined by the value of the feature Gamma. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Controls the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (LUTSelector = Luminance) AND (LUTContent = Gamma).

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the correction of defect pixels.
Boolean.Description: Enables the correction of defect pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelListEntryActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Determines if the pixel correction is active for the selected entry.
Boolean.Description: Determines if the pixel correction is active for the selected entry. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelListSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Defect Pixel List to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Defect Pixel List to control. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Pixel
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects Defect Pixel List for defect pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects Defect Pixel List for defect pixels. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelListIndex

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic adjusting the gains of the active transformation matrix.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic adjusting the gains of the active transformation matrix. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Color transformation is user controlled using the various Colortransformation features.
EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is user controlled using the various Colortransformation features. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Color transformation is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Color transformation is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutoFeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Enumeration.Name: SequencerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the sequencer mechanism is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the sequencer mechanism is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR (ShortExposureTimeEnable = True) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (BalanceWhiteAuto != Off) OR (GainAuto != Off) OR (ExposureAuto != Off) OR (ColorTransformationAuto != Off) OR (MROI enabled) OR (ImageCompressionMode = JPEG AND ((SequencerFeatureEnable[Height] = On) OR (SequencerFeatureEnable[Width] = On))).

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: SequencerConfigurationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the sequencer configuration mode is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the sequencer configuration mode is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (ShortExposureTimeEnable = True) OR (GainSelector != All) OR (BalanceWhiteAuto != Off) OR (SequencerMode = On) OR (MROI enabled).

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the sequencer configuration mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the sequencer configuration mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the sequencer configuration mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the sequencer configuration mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: SequencerFeatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which sequencer features to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which sequencer features to control. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image.
EnumEntry.Description: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetX

EnumEntry.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Width
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Height
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Selects the events that will be the source to increment the Counter. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterResetActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValueAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: SequencerFeatureEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the sequencer sets.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the sequencer sets. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: ((Image Compression is not implemented) OR (SequencerMode = On)) OR ((SequencerFeatureSelector != Height) AND (SequencerFeatureSelector != Width)).

Integer.Name: SequencerSetSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the sequencer set to which further feature settings applies.
Integer.Description: Selects the sequencer set to which further feature settings applies. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

Command.ToolTip: Saves the current device state to the sequencer set selected by the SequencerSetSelector.
Command.Description: Saves the current device state to the sequencer set selected by the SequencerSetSelector. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

Command.Name: SequencerSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the sequencer set selected by SequencerSetSelector in the device.
Command.Description: Loads the sequencer set selected by SequencerSetSelector in the device. Even if SequencerMode is off, this will change the device state to the configuration of the selected set. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetActive
Integer.ToolTip: Contains the currently active sequencer set.
Integer.Description: Contains the currently active sequencer set. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetStart
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer.
Integer.Description: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: SequencerPathSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects to which branching path further path settings applies.
Integer.Description: Selects to which branching path further path settings applies. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetNext
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the next sequencer set.
Integer.Description: Specifies the next sequencer set. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

Enumeration.Name: SequencerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the sequencer trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the sequencer trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Counter End.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Counter End. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Counter End. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Specifies Line 0 as external trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies Line 1 as external trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies Line 1 as external trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Exposure Active. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOutActive
