EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Read Out Active. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Timer End.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Timer End. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the sequencer trigger. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Control Access. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlAccessSwitchoverActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Control Access Switchover Active.
EnumEntry.Description: Control Access Switchover Active. AVAILABLE: (GevSupportedOption[PrimaryApplicationSwitchover] = True).

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of the logical link to use.
Integer.Description: Index of the logical link to use. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: If change of logical link is not supported by the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR (IP reassembly is not supported by the device).

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: GevSCFTD
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: If change of unconditional streaming status is not supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodesSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.
Enumeration.DisplayName: Gev GVCP Extended Status Codes Selector

EnumEntry.Name: Version1_1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Version1.1.
EnumEntry.Description: Version1.1. AVAILABLE: (GevSupportedOption[ExtendedStatusCodes] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Version2_0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Version2.0.
EnumEntry.Description: Version2.0. AVAILABLE: (GevSupportedOption[ExtendedStatusCodesVersion2_0] = True).

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodes
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of extended status codes.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port for the message channel. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0) AND (EventChannel Source Port is supported). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: GVSPConfigurationBlockID64Bit
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the 64 bit block ID length.
Boolean.Description: Enables the 64 bit block ID length. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: InterfaceSpeedMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Show the interface speed mode as string.
Enumeration.Description: Show the interface speed mode as string. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Ethernet100Mbps
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Operation at 100 Mbps.
EnumEntry.Description: Operation at 100 Mbps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Ethernet1Gbps
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Operation at 1 Gbps.
EnumEntry.Description: Operation at 1 Gbps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Ethernet2_5Gbps
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Operation at 2.5 Gbps.
EnumEntry.Description: Operation at 2.5 Gbps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Ethernet5Gbps
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Operation at 5 Gbps.
EnumEntry.Description: Operation at 5 Gbps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Ethernet10Gbps
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Operation at 10 Gbps.
EnumEntry.Description: Operation at 10 Gbps. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1. AVAILABLE: (UserSet1 was saved before).

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2. AVAILABLE: (UserSet2 was saved before).

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 3. AVAILABLE: (UserSet3 was saved before).

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR (SequencerMode = On) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (UserSet[UserSetSelector] was never saved before).

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Saves the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (UserSetSelector = Default) OR (SequencerMode = On) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On).

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 3. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetFeatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which individual UserSet feature to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which individual UserSet feature to control. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ActionDeviceKey
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
EnumEntry.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ActionGroupKey
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
EnumEntry.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ActionGroupMask
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
EnumEntry.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureHeight
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Height of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Height of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureRegionMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the mode of the selected Auto Feature Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the mode of the selected Auto Feature Region. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Width of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Width of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureOffsetX
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureOffsetY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AutoFeatureRegionReference
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Reference Region of interest.
EnumEntry.Description: The Reference Region of interest. The Auto Feature Region is part of this region and all Auto Feature Region features refers to this Reference Region. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BinningHorizontal
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
EnumEntry.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BinningVertical
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
EnumEntry.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BinningVerticalMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BlackLevel
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BrightnessAutoNominalValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the nominal value for brightness in percent of full scale.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the nominal value for brightness in percent of full scale. It will be adjust with consider the setting in BrightnessAutoPriority. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BrightnessAutoPriority
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the highest priority auto feature to adjust the brightness.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the highest priority auto feature to adjust the brightness. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkModeActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.
EnumEntry.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ColorTransformationAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic adjusting the gains of the active transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the mode for automatic adjusting the gains of the active transformation matrix. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterEventActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterEventSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the events that will be the source to increment the Counter. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterResetActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterResetSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the correction of defect pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the correction of defect pixels. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceFrontUARTSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source control for frontside UART interface.
EnumEntry.Description: Source control for frontside UART interface. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceTemperatureStatusTransition
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature threshold for selected status transition in degrees Celsius (C).
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature threshold for selected status transition in degrees Celsius (C). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
EnumEntry.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: EventNotification
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Activates or deactivates the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
EnumEntry.Description: Activates or deactivates the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureAutoMinValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Minimal value of ExposureTime calculable by exposure auto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Minimal value of ExposureTime calculable by exposure auto algorithm. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureAutoMaxValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Maximal value of ExposureTime calculable by exposure auto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Maximal value of ExposureTime calculable by exposure auto algorithm. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureTime
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FocusStepper
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the integer value of the Focus.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the integer value of the Focus. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the frame counter, which is part of the chunk data too.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the frame counter, which is part of the chunk data too. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GainAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GainAutoMinValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Minimal value of Gain calculable by gain auto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Minimal value of Gain calculable by gain auto algorithm. AVAILABLE: (GainSelector = All).

EnumEntry.Name: GainAutoMaxValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Maximal value of Gain calculable by gain auto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Maximal value of Gain calculable by gain auto algorithm. AVAILABLE: (GainSelector = All).

EnumEntry.Name: Gamma
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GevSCFTD
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GevSCPD
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Height
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ImageCompressionMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer. Optionally, chunk data can be appended to the compressed image (See the Chunk Data Control chapter). AVAILABLE: If Image Compression is implemented.

EnumEntry.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the quality of the produced compressed stream.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the quality of the produced compressed stream. AVAILABLE: If Image Compression is implemented.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDebouncerHighTimeAbs
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from low to high.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from low to high. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDebouncerLowTimeAbs
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from high to low.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from high to low. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineInverter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the PWM mode of the selected output line.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the PWM mode of the selected output line. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMaxDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMaxDutyCycle
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent.
EnumEntry.Description: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMDutyCycle
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offers the duty cycle in percent.
EnumEntry.Description: Offers the duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTContent
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Describes the content of the selected LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Describes the content of the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Activates the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetX
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OpticControllerThermalCompensation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the thermal compensation of the optic controller.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the thermal compensation of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PixelFormat
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PtpEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP).
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PtpMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the PTP clock type the device will act as.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the PTP clock type the device will act as. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PtpServoStatusThreshold
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Threshold of time difference to Ptp Master Clock for transition PtpServoStatus Unknown to Locked.
EnumEntry.Description: Threshold of time difference to Ptp Master Clock for transition PtpServoStatus Unknown to Locked. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadoutMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: RegionMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReverseX
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReverseY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorADDigitization
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the sensors AD digitization in bits per pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the sensors AD digitization in bits per pixels. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorShutterMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the shutter mode of the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the shutter mode of the device. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerSetStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerSetNext
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the next sequencer set.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the next sequencer set. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerTriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerTriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the sequencer trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the sequencer trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SharpeningFactor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Contains the factor for Sharpening.
EnumEntry.Description: Contains the factor for Sharpening. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SharpeningMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Sharpening Mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Sharpening Mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SharpeningSensitivityThreshold
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Holds the value of the Sharpening Sensitivity Threshold.
EnumEntry.Description: Holds the value of the Sharpening Sensitivity Threshold. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ShortExposureTimeEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if short exposure time should be supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if short exposure time should be supported. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TestPattern
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerTriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerTriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TransferStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the device. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled". If the TransferStart feature is not writable (locked), the application should not start the transfer and should avoid using the feature until it becomes writable again. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TransferStop
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Stops the streaming of data Block(s).
EnumEntry.Description: Stops the streaming of data Block(s). The current block transmission will be completed. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled". AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValueAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register. It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Width
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDREnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode of the camera. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRGainRatioSelector
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the gain ratio for HDR mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the gain ratio for HDR mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRExposureTimeRatio
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the exposure time ratio for HDR mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the exposure time ratio for HDR mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRProcessingEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the calculation of an interleaved HDR image of the sensor to an HDR image.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the calculation of an interleaved HDR image of the sensor to an HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRSplitviewEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the split view of interleaved HDR image.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the split view of interleaved HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRProcessingThresholdMin
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the lower threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the lower threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRProcessingThresholdMax
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the upper threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the upper threshold to determine valid pixels for HDR processing. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveGradient
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the gradient at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the gradient at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveGridpoint
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRTonemappingCurveOffset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the offset at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the offset at selected grid point for HDR tone-mapping transfer curve. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: HDRTonemappingEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the tone-mapping of the calculated HDR image.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the tone-mapping of calculated HDR image. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: UserSetFeatureEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the UserSets.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the UserSets. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: UserSetDataEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the feature UserSetData.
Boolean.Description: Enables the feature UserSetData. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: UserSetStartAddressSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the selector for the Start Address of a single UserSet where the UserSet Data can read from.
Integer.Description: Sets the selector for the Start Address of a single UserSet where the UserSet Data can read from. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Register.Name: UserSetData
Register.ToolTip: Data of a UserSet. Start Address is selected by feature User Set Start Address Selector.
Register.Description: Data of a UserSet. Start Address is selected by feature User Set Start Address Selector. AVAILABLE: (UserSetDataEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: ImageDataEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the feature ImageData.
Boolean.Description: Enables the feature ImageData. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Register.Name: ImageData
Register.Description: Data of an Image. AVAILABLE: (ImageDataEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: CustomDataConfigurationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the custom data configuration mode is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the custom data configuration mode is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Description: Disables the custom data configuration mode. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the custom data configuration mode.

Integer.Name: CustomDataSelector

Integer.Description: Selects the index of the custom data byte array. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: CustomData
Integer.ToolTip: Holds one byte of custom special data.
Integer.Description: Holds one byte of custom special data. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (CustomDataConfigurationMode = Off).

Boolean.Name: PtpEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP).
Boolean.Description: Enables the Precision Time Protocol (PTP). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: PtpServoStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the clock servo.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the clock servo. When the servo is in a locked state, the value returned is 'Locked'. When the servo is in a non-locked state, a device-specific value can be returned to give specific information. If no device-specific value is available to describe the current state of the clock servo, the value should be 'Unknown'. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Unknown
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Unknown.
EnumEntry.Description: Unknown. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Locked
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Locked.
EnumEntry.Description: Locked. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: PtpServoStatusThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Threshold of time difference to Ptp Master Clock for transition PtpServoStatus Unknown to Locked.
Integer.Description: Threshold of time difference to Ptp Master Clock for transition PtpServoStatus Unknown to Locked. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (PtpEnable = True).

Integer.Name: PtpOffsetFromMaster
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: PtpSyncMessageInterval
Float.ToolTip: Returns the latched sync message interval from the PTP master clock in milliseconds.
Float.Description: Returns the latched sync message interval from the PTP master clock in milliseconds. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True) AND ((PtpStatus = Slave) OR (PtpStatus = Master)). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: PtpSyncMessageIntervalStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns if the latched sync message interval from the PTP master clock is supported by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Returns if the latched sync message interval from the PTP master clock is supported by the device. An unsupported sync message interval may result in PtpServoStatus instability. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True) AND ((PtpStatus = Slave) OR (PtpStatus = Master)). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Valid
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sync message interval is valid and supported by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Sync message interval is valid and supported by the device. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Invalid
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sync message interval is not valid.
EnumEntry.Description: Sync message interval is not valid. This may result in PtpServoStatus instability. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: PtpClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched clock ID of the PTP device. PTP Parent Clock ID. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: PtpParentClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device. The parent clock ID is the clock ID of the current master clock. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: PtpGrandmasterClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device. The grandmaster clock ID is the clock ID of the current grandmaster clock. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: PtpMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the PTP clock type the device will act as.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the PTP clock type the device will act as. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (PtpEnable = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Slave
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device's clock will act as a PTP slave only to align with a master device's clock.
EnumEntry.Description: The device's clock will act as a PTP slave only to align with a master device's clock. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Auto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device uses the IEEE 1588 best master clock algorithm to determine which device is master, and which devices are slaves.
EnumEntry.Description: The device uses the IEEE 1588 best master clock algorithm to determine which device is master, and which devices are slaves. In case the device is not the best master, it will act as a PTP slave. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: PtpTimestampOffset
Integer.ToolTip: This value can be added or subtracted to the ptp ethernet rx and/or tx timestamps.
Integer.Description: This value can be added or subtracted to the ptp ethernet rx and/or tx timestamps. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: PtpTimestampOffsetMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: The Mode how to handle PtpTimestampOffset for command PtpTimestampOffsetSet.
Enumeration.Description: The Mode how to handle PtpTimestampOffset for command PtpTimestampOffsetSet. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: RxAndTxOffset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timestamp Offset will be used for both Tx and Rx.
EnumEntry.Description: Timestamp Offset will be used for both Tx and Rx. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: RxOffset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timestamp Offset will be used for Rx only.
EnumEntry.Description: Timestamp Offset will be used for Rx only. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TxOffset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timestamp Offset will be used for Tx only.
EnumEntry.Description: Timestamp Offset will be used for Tx only. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: PtpTimestampOffsetSet
Command.ToolTip: Sets PtpTimestampOffset active like described in PtpTimestampOffsetMode.
Command.Description: Sets PtpTimestampOffset active like described in PtpTimestampOffsetMode. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: PtpClockOffset
Integer.ToolTip: This value will be added or subtracted to the cameras internal timestamp.
Integer.Description: This value will be added or subtracted to the cameras internal timestamp. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: PtpClockOffsetMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: The Mode how to handle PtpClockOffset for command PtpClockOffsetSet.
Enumeration.Description: The Mode how to handle PtpClockOffset for command PtpClockOffsetSet. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Add
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timestamp Offset will be added to cameras internal timestamp.
EnumEntry.Description: Timestamp Offset will be added to cameras internal timestamp. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Sub
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timestamp Offset will be subtracted from cameras internal timestamp.
EnumEntry.Description: Timestamp Offset will be subtracted from cameras internal timestamp. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: PtpClockOffsetSet
Command.ToolTip: Sets PtpClockOffset active like described in PtpClockOffsetMode.
Command.Description: Sets PtpClockOffset active like described in PtpClockOffsetMode. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: PtpDriftOffset
Integer.ToolTip: This value will be added or subtracted to the cameras internal timestamp increment.
Integer.Description: This value will be added or subtracted to the cameras internal timestamp increment. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: PtpDriftOffsetMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: The Mode how to handle PtpDriftOffset for command PtpDriftOffsetSet.
Enumeration.Description: The Mode how to handle PtpDriftOffset for command PtpDriftOffsetSet. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Add
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Drift Offset will be added to cameras internal timestamp increment.
EnumEntry.Description: Drift Offset will be added to cameras internal timestamp increment. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Sub
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Drift Offset will be subtracted from cameras internal timestamp increment.
EnumEntry.Description: Drift Offset will be subtracted from cameras internal timestamp increment. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: PtpDriftOffsetSet
Command.ToolTip: Sets PtpDriftOffset active like described in PtpDriftOffsetMode.
Command.Description: Sets PtpDriftOffset active like described in PtpDriftOffsetMode. AVAILABLE: (PtpEnable = True). LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: PtpUseControllerTestSettings
Boolean.ToolTip: If true use PtpKp and PtpKi as pi controller values.
Boolean.Description: If true use PtpKp and PtpKi as pi controller values. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: PtpKp
Float.ToolTip: Kp of servos pi controller if PtpUseControllerTestSettings = True.
Float.Description: Kp of servos pi controller if PtpUseControllerTestSettings = True. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: PtpKi
Float.ToolTip: Ki of servos pi controller if PtpUseControllerTestSettings = True.
Float.Description: Ki of servos pi controller if PtpUseControllerTestSettings = True. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Command.Name: TransferStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the device. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled". If the TransferStart feature is not writable (locked), the application should not start the transfer and should avoid using the feature until it becomes writable again. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Command.Name: TransferStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the streaming of data Block(s).
Command.Description: Stops the streaming of data Block(s). The current block transmission will be completed. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled". AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: TransferStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which status of the transfer module to read.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which status of the transfer module to read. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Streaming
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data blocks are transmitted when enough data is available.
EnumEntry.Description: Data blocks are transmitted when enough data is available. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Stopped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data blocks transmission is stopped.
EnumEntry.Description: Data blocks transmission is stopped. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: TransferStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the status of the Transfer module signal selected by TransferStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the status of the Transfer module signal selected by TransferStatusSelector. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: MemoryMaxBlocks
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum count of available memory blocks.
Integer.Description: Maximum count of available memory blocks. It depends on partial scan features, pixelformat and selected acquisitionformat. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: MemoryFreeBlocks
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the count of free memory blocks in the selected memory part.
Integer.Description: Returns the count of free memory blocks in the selected memory part. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: OpticControllerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which optic controller to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which optic controller to configure. AVAILABLE: (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: OpticController0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Optic Controller 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Optic Controller 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OpticController1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Optic Controller 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Optic Controller 1. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: OpticControllerInitialize
Command.ToolTip: Initializes the optic controller and makes it ready for use.
Command.Description: Initializes the optic controller and makes it ready for use. AVAILABLE: (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: OpticControllerStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reads the state of the optic controller.
Enumeration.Description: Reads the state of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

EnumEntry.Name: NotConnected
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The optic controller is physically not connected.
EnumEntry.Description: The optic controller is physically not connected. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: NotSupported
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The optic controller is physically connected but not supported.
EnumEntry.Description: The optic controller is physically connected but not supported. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Ready
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The optic controller is ready to use.
EnumEntry.Description: The optic controller is ready to use. AVAILABLE: Always.

StringReg.Name: OpticControllerVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the optic controller.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

StringReg.Name: OpticControllerModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Model name of the optic controller.
StringReg.Description: Model name of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

StringReg.Name: OpticControllerSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: Serial number of the optic controller.
StringReg.Description: Serial number of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: OpticControllerFirmwareVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Firmware version of the optic controller.
Integer.Description: Firmware version of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] != NotConnected) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Float.Name: OpticControllerTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Optic controller temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Optic controller temperature in degrees Celsius (C). AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: OpticControllerThermalCompensation
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the thermal compensation of the optic controller.
Boolean.Description: Enables the thermal compensation of the optic controller. AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (OpticControllerFirmwareVersion >= 38) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: FocusStepper
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the integer value of the Focus.
Integer.Description: Specifies the integer value of the Focus. AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: FocalLength
Float.ToolTip: Focal length in millimeters (mm).
Float.Description: Focal length in millimeters (mm). AVAILABLE: (OpticControllerStatus[OpticControllerSelector] = Ready) AND (DeviceFrontUARTSource = OpticControl). LOCKED: Read Only feature.
